main.name: Satyajeet Desale
main.occupation: Software Engineer | Leader | Father | Amateur Photographer | Geek
main.bio: Software Development Manager with 9 years' experience in full stack product development. Passion for building innovative industry leading products. I love learning new things.
main.contactmessage: I like talking about technology. I'd love to hear from you.

work.title: Senior Engineering Manager
work.description: Leading and building web application platform. Proposed and led process improvements which brought down application onboarding time by 70%. Led and built Cerner wide framework to rollout new features for applications. Successfully migrated 600+ clients to new database, received a NOTT award for this achievement. Led and built application quality standards framework for monitoring quality. Ruby on Rails, Java, JavaScript, ReactJS, MySQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed iOS and Android applications along with PHP web application.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
